title: mixymoney
author: mixymoney
created_time: September 30, 2022, 01:02:11 PMLast edit: October 19, 2022, 03:35:10 PM by mixymoney
content: Benefits of using our mixer-The algorithm: BTC Mixer 2.0Bitcoin Mixer 2.0 applies an innovative algorithm, which is totally different from the approach of classic mixers. We replace your crypto coins with verified coins from European, Asian and North American Bitcoin stock exchanges. It significantly increases anonymization level and reduces a risk of getting cryptocoins of a doubtful character as in classic mixers.-No registration, no logsWe do not store logs, all necessary information for transactions processing is deleted right after work completion and transaction confirmation or beyond the expiration of address lifetime for unexecuted requests.-We are available 24 x 7 x 365Our algorithms are fully automated and our service operates around the clock. We provide our clients with ongoing support. In case of issues we are seeking to promptly address them.-Letters of guaranteeWe provide digitally signed letters of guarantee which evidence a 100% obligation of our service to you. Please retain letters of guarantee. This gives an additional assurance to deal with any disputes that may arise.- We randomize transaction fees to make tracking impossible. Maximum mixing fee is 5% + 0.0007 BTC- Minimum mixing amount is 0.003 BTC: maximum is 50 BTC- Generated BTC address for mixing is valid for 168 hours (7 days)- Maximum mixing time is 6 hours. The timer starts after first confirmation of your transaction- You will receive random amounts of clean BTC within 6 hours after first confirmation- You will see a letter with PGP-key containing all necessary information after creating an order. Please save this letter in case if something goes wrongOnion link: 7enabayifwnjvsuduwbkmjmwbbuqu2zvoqfo7gavkywxyoypywm6m3qd.onionClearnet: https://[banned mixer]/Telegram bot: https://t.me/mukcuk_bot (Temporary available only in Russian language)Telegram support: https://t.me/Lovemoney01

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: mixymoney on September 30, 2022, 01:02:11 PMBitcoin Mixer 2.0 applies an innovative algorithm, which is totally different from the approach of classic mixers. We replace your crypto coins with verified coins from European, Asian and North American Bitcoin stock exchanges. It significantly increases anonymization level and reduces a risk of getting cryptocoins of a doubtful character as in classic mixers.Hey, I've seen this one before:Quote from: btcshaker on November 17, 2019, 06:25:20 AMBitcoin Mixer 2.0 applies an innovative algorithm, which is totally different from the approach of classic mixers. We replace your crypto coins with verified coins from European, Asian and North American Bitcoin stock exchanges. It significantly increases anonymization level and reduces a risk of getting cryptocoins of a doubtful character as in classic mixers.That was 3 years ago, so it's for sure not "innovative". It is plagiarism though, which isn't allowed. Any chance you're using Jambler and copied this from them?Quote from: mixymoney on September 30, 2022, 01:02:11 PMWe replace your crypto coins with verified coins from European, Asian and North American Bitcoin stock exchanges. ~We do not store logsExchanges log everything, so there's no privacy whatsoever.

comments.author: LeGaulois
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on September 30, 2022, 06:44:12 PMThat was 3 years ago, so it's for sure not "innovative". It is plagiarism though, which isn't allowed. Any chance you're using Jambler and copied this from them?Yep, I confirm that's one of the mixers in partnership with [banned mixer]. Hence the text (provided by them) that several others use as well.Especially the FAQ, since it has to be the same as others (more or less), since [banned mixer] "decides"You would probably find others references on bitcointalk.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: I thought https://[banned mixer]/ is new project in the forum but unknown to me it was since last year. I visit the website through the signature campaign that launched today and from the website I was directed to this thread through one of the three contact links. The website looks like a Russian site because there are only two languages there and which are Russian Language and English Language. And what I discovered from the site is that the 0.0007 BTC commission is too big for mixing or I am the one that didn't understand the clause there.
